verbs.description: [ARG0: Pence] [V: said] [ARG1: the Trump administration has “ fully cooperated ” with Mueller ’s probe , including turning over more than one million documents]
Pence said the Trump administration [V: has] “ fully cooperated ” with Mueller ’s probe , including turning over more than one million documents
Pence said [ARG0: the Trump administration] has “ [ARGM-EXT: fully] [V: cooperated] ” [ARG1: with Mueller ’s probe] , [ARGM-ADV: including turning over more than one million documents]
Pence said the Trump administration has “ fully cooperated ” [ARG2: with Mueller ’s probe] , [V: including] [ARG1: turning over more than one million documents]
Pence said [ARG0: the Trump administration] has “ fully cooperated ” with Mueller ’s probe , including [V: turning] over [ARG1: more than one million documents]
